perturbation.original_text: The parties and the arbitration panel shall be bound to maintain the confidentiality of this Agreement, the dispute and any award, except to the extent necessary to enforce any such award. The prevailing party, if a party is so designated in the arbitration award, shall be entitled to recover from the other party its costs and fees, including attorneys' fees, associated with such arbitration. By agreeing to this binding arbitration provision, the parties understand that they are waiving certain rights and protections which may otherwise be available if a dispute between the parties were determined by litigation in court, including, without limitation, the right to seek or obtain certain types of damages precluded by this arbitration provision, the right to a jury trial, certain rights of appeal, and a right to invoke formal rules of procedure and evidence. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, each party shall be entitled, at any time, without first resorting to the dispute resolution process set forth above, to seek injunctive or other equitable relief from any court of competent jurisdiction, wherever such party deems appropriate, in order to preserve or enforce such party's rights hereunder.
perturbation.changed_text: The parties and the arbitration panel shall be bound to maintain the confidentiality of this Agreement, the dispute and any award, except to the extent necessary to enforce any such award. The prevailing party, if a party is so designated in the arbitration award, shall be entitled to recover from the other party its costs and fees, including attorneys' fees, associated with such arbitration. By agreeing to this binding arbitration provision, the parties understand that they are waiving certain rights and protections which may otherwise be available if a dispute between the parties were determined by litigation in court. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, each party shall be entitled, at any time, without first resorting to the dispute resolution process set forth above, to seek injunctive or other equitable relief from any court of competent jurisdiction, wherever such party deems appropriate, in order to preserve or enforce such party's rights hereunder. The jury trial is waivable with written consent from both parties.
perturbation.explanation: By stating that the Jury trial is waivable from written consent, this change contradicts the original text. The original stated that rights and protections were being waived in full, with the change that jury trial is now waivable introduces contradiction.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Seventh Amendment to the United States Constitution, Contract Law

perturbation.original_text: The Term of this Agreement (the "Term") shall commence on the Effective Date listed above and continue for twenty (20) years, unless sooner terminated as provided in Section 7(b). (b) This Agreement may be terminated at any time by either party, effective immediately upon written notice, if the other party: (i) becomes insolvent; (ii) files a petition in bankruptcy; or (iii) makes an assignment for the benefit of its creditors. Either party may terminate this Agreement upon written notice if the other party materially breaches this Agreement and fails to cure such breach within thirty (30) days after the date that it receives written notice of such breach from the non-breaching party.
perturbation.changed_text: The Term of this Agreement (the "Term") shall commence on the Effective Date listed above and continue for twenty (20) years, unless sooner terminated as provided in Section 7(b). (b) This Agreement may be terminated at any time by either party if the other party becomes insolvent. Either party may terminate this Agreement upon written notice if the other party materially breaches this Agreement and fails to cure such breach within thirty (30) days after the date that it receives written notice of such breach from the non-breaching party.
perturbation.explanation: The original text stated that this Agreement may be terminated at any time, but conditions that it would effective immediately upon written notice. The new condition of removing that the condition of immediate effectiveness introduces a contradiction to the original text, as terminations are possible for reasons that are not just if one party becomes insolvent.

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement contains the entire agreement and understanding between the parties with regard to the subject matter hereof, and supersedes all prior and contemporaneous oral or written agreements and representations with respect to such subject matter. This Agreement may be modified or amended only in a writing signed by all parties.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement contains the entire agreement and understanding between the parties with regard to the subject matter hereof, and supersedes all prior and contemporaneous oral or written agreements and representations with respect to such subject matter. This Agreement may be modified or amended through mutual agreement by all parties.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by removing the condition that requires that the modification or amendment be in writing. With this condition removed, there is a contradiction with the former stating that the the entirity supersedes both oral and written agreements. This condition of modification by mutual agreement now introduces that oral modifications can be made.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Statute of Frauds, Parol Evidence Rule, Contract Law
